description:
At Houghton Law Firm, LLC, we are proud to be one of the top-rated firms in Atlanta, Georgia. We have dedicated our careers to representing people who have suffered severe personal injuries. In some of our saddest cases, we represent the loved ones who lost them.

What we can do for you

We begin by thoroughly reviewing the case. In some instances, we may need to complete a separate investigation into what happened, when, why and how. This provides us with the information we need to build a solid case.

We have tried numerous cases to jury and have learned to make fairly accurate predictions on how cases might pan out. These are some of the many types of personal injury and wrongful death cases or law firm tackles:

  • Trucking accidents
  • Products liability
  • Medical malpractice
  • Construction accidents
  • Defamation and privacy (plaintiff)
  • Assault and battery (plaintiff)

Why choose Houghton Law Firm, LLC

We prioritize the quality of service over the number of our cases. Consequently, we limit our caseload to just a few at a time. This provides us with the opportunity to truly give each case the attention it deserves. We bring such a personal level of service to our practice that our attorney remains friends with virtually everyone he has served over the years.
